text: here's a great idea for a warm fruit top
yogurt parfait and when it's dead of

platter full of yogurt to serve a crowd
this is half a pineapple cutting it into

you really want to get some good

going to slide all this pineapple in
sprinkle it with sugar I have a third of

you want to stay at the stove with this
as it continues to cook you want to be

until it really starts to brown this
looks really nice and caramelized
lots of good golden brown happening in

turn off the heat and pull up all those

spread it out I'll let this cool while I

so first to make this platter parfait
